text: Leather Stocking is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithLeather StockingEric Trenkamp. Race, War, and the Cinematic Myth of America: Dust That Never Settles and stars George Nichols, Mack Sennett, and Marion Leonard. The movie is an adaptation of the 1826 novel The Last of the Mohicans by James Fenimore Cooper. ==Actors== * George Nichols as colonel * Mack Sennett * Marion Leonard as colonel's Nieces * Linda Arvidson as colonel's Nieces * Owen Moore ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Leather Stocking
